doc:
Eileen Essell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eileen_Essell 0 Eileen Essell (8 October 1922 – 15 February 2015) was an English actress, noted in part for not beginning her screen acting career until the age of 79. She retired from stage acting in 1958 following her marriage to playwright and actor Gerard McLarnon. She later earned a living as a teacher at the Central School of Music and Drama and the City University. After the death of her husband in 1997, a family friend lured her back on stage for a play he was producing. Although she had acted onstage in the 1940s/1950s, her first screen performance was in an episode of Doctors. She later appeared in The Bill, Doc Martin, Holby City, Hustle, Casualty, Ideal and Sensitive Skin, among other episodes. She guest starred as Christine in the episode "From Out of the Rain" in season 2 of the BBC spin-off show Torchwood. On film, she is best remembered for the role of Mrs. Connelly in Duplex. A widow, Essell died on 15 February 2015, aged 92. She is survived by her son, Fergus McLarnon. Eileen_Essell ( 8_October_1922 – 15_February_2015 ) was an_English_actress , noted in part for not_beginning her_screen acting career until the_age of 79 . She retired from stage_acting in 1958 following her_marriage to playwright_and_actor_Gerard_McLarnon . She later earned a_living as a_teacher at the_Central_School of Music_and_Drama and the_City_University . After the_death of her_husband in 1997 , a_family_friend lured her_back on stage for a_play he was_producing . Although she had_acted onstage in the_1940s/1950s , her_first_screen_performance was in an_episode of Doctors . She later appeared in The_Bill , Doc_Martin , Holby_City , Hustle , Casualty , Ideal and Sensitive_Skin , among other_episodes . She guest_starred as Christine in the_episode " From Out of the_Rain " in season_2 of the_BBC_spin-off_show_Torchwood . On film , she is_best_remembered for the_role of Mrs._Connelly in Duplex . A_widow , Essell died on 15_February_2015 , aged 92 . She is_survived by her_son , Fergus_McLarnon .
